context_history.content: I want to learn about: html. DO NOT greet me. Immediately start lesson Step 1 by explaining the core concept on the whiteboard.

HTML, or HyperText Markup Language, is the standard language used to create the structure of web pages. Think of it as the skeleton of a house, defining where the walls, doors, and windows go before any decoration is added.

visual_content.detail: HTML Code, Web Browser, Visual Website, 'The browser reads HTML code to render a visual website.'
